EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the IDC white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Toward Actionable Information: Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics (BDA) white paper. We know you're likely considering all the options available for turning BDA into transformational business value and we appreciate the chance to show you our leading data solutions to do just that.
For more about BDA and related topics that were discussed in the white paper, please visit:
- Pivotal BDS <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite]]>: Open Source, Scale-out Data Management Portfolio - White Paper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]>: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation - Introducing Greenplum <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/introducing-greenplum-worlds-first-open-source-mpp-data-warehouse]]>: Worldâ€™s First Open Source MPP Data Warehouse - Apache HAWQ <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/the-way-to-hadoop-native-sql]]>: The Way to Hadoop-Native SQL - 2 Reasons <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/2-reasons-why-in-memory-data-grids-are-a-must-have-for-apps-at-scale]]>: Why In-Memory Data Grids are a Must-Have For Apps at Scale - White Paper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/in-memory-data-caching-for-microservices-architectures]]>: In-Memory Data Caching for Microservices Architectures
Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation by partnering with the world's most admired brands building, evolving, scaling and adapting to the new realities of Big Data and Analytics. Contact us <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c0p02r2I0NAU2dCJT0OHV00]]> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your BDA initiatives.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email-confirmation&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=asset-download-confirmation]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
